Topic.Title: Get rid of UNDO, LOG, and HTML Tools??

Posts.EditableText:
Is it possible to get rid of the UNDO, LOG, and HTML Tools options in the desktop player? If so, where would I find the code to disable this?

Thank You
InsertCoin25
Posts.HTML:
Is it possible to get rid of the UNDO, LOG, and HTML Tools options in the desktop player? If so, where would I find the code to disable this?

Thank You
InsertCoin25

Posts.EditableText: They don't appear when your game is published to a .quest file.
Posts.HTML: They don't appear when your game is published to a .quest file.

Posts.EditableText:
I just published an example using Quest 5.5 beta and they appear under the tabs: Edit and View. Am I doing something wrong or is there a way to disable them before publishing?

Thank You
